author: adambirds
body:
Will it be released for Ubuntu 18.04 at some point soon?

I setup the Ubuntu 18.04 Microsoft Repository on my system and tried to run the following as I would on 17.04:

`sudo apt-get install -y powershell` 

But no powershell. Is there an ETA on when it will be released?

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Duplicate! It has been discussed and (it supposed) to be available for the next  v6.1.0-preview.3 Release of PowerShell Core. 

We are all waiting patiently!!
:)

comments.author: adambirds
comments.body: @MaximoTrinidad can you point me at the issue for it? Couldn't seem to see one. Ta

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Sure! 
Dup - https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/6914
Dup - https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/6942
Dup - https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/6996

Next release of PSCore will see it available for Ubuntu 18.04.  They already worked on it!

title: Ubuntu 18.04 Release
